channel.title: [VB6] Installation help needed
channel.description:
Hey guys! I downloaded a rared (or zipped) file from http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,135529.0.html and I extracted it into a folder. I burnt what I extracted (VB6) with nero and I tried to install it but at some point an error message pops up "You must first run the installation wizard before running this setup" I press OK and it just tells me installation failed, etc. Any one had this problem? Any one knows how to fix it?
Thanks in advance to any one who helps.
[u]Edit1:[/u] Also I'm running WinXP pro if it matters...

item.title: [VB6] Installation help needed
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

You probably didn’t run the “Installation Wizard”. I have no idea what is on the disk, but try looking for other files that might pretain to installing.
May I suggest downloading Visual Basic.net 2008 Express Edition?
http://www.microsoft.com/express/product/
It’s better than VB6 by far.

Read full topic

item.title: [VB6] Installation help needed

item.description:
